# Getting Started

Now that your Mojaloop Sandbox is up and running, here's what you can do next:

  1. Read through the overview section, and get a feel for what this Sandbox offers
  2. Play with the Mojaloop Demos
  3. Take the DFSP Onboarding Tutorial
  4. Explore the Different APIs Mojaloop Offers
  5. Read the Mojaloop Documentation (opens new window)
